l7:ResourceSet.l7:Resource: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:Simple/> <L7p:Include> <L7p:PolicyGuid stringValue="912d9fac-e790-4a1d-b7a1-0239f2aead08"/> </L7p:Include> <L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXF1ZXN0Lm1haW5wYXJ0fQ=="/> <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="inSimpleEncapsulatedAssertionFragment"/> </L7p:SetVariable> <L7p:Encapsulated> <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="506589b0-eba5-4b3f-81b5-be7809817623"/> <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="Simple Encapsulated Assertion"/> </L7p:Encapsulated> <L7p:JdbcQuery> <L7p:ConnectionName stringValue="SSG"/> <L7p:ConvertVariablesToStrings booleanValue="false"/> <L7p:NamingMap mapValue="included"> <L7p:entry> <L7p:key stringValue="current_version"/> <L7p:value stringValue="ssgVersion"/> </L7p:entry> </L7p:NamingMap> <L7p:SqlQuery stringValue="select current_version from ssg_version;"/> <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="simpleJdbcQuery"/> </L7p:JdbcQuery> <L7p:HardcodedResponse> <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue=""/> </L7p:HardcodedResponse> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>
